definition: written in or belonging to a writing system using pictorial symbols, a writing system using picture symbols
details:
adjective
- written in or belonging to a writing system using pictorial symbols
= synonyms: hieroglyphical
- resembling hieroglyphic writing
= synonyms: hieroglyphical
noun
- a writing system using picture symbols
= synonyms: hieroglyph
- writing that resembles hieroglyphics (usually by being illegible)
= synonyms: hieroglyph
